sys_data_source.name: Fortify - Issues
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
/* ** Get a list of all OPEN Issues ** (use this script only ONCE to seed the table) ** ** The "Analysis" GUID is 87f2364f-dcd4-49e6-861d-f8d3f351686b ** (SELECT TOP 1000 * FROM attr) ** ** Do NOT include these Project IDs: ** 15 = test ** 41 = Open Source ** 46 = 3rd Party */
SELECT [i].[id] as [ID] ,[i].[issueInstanceId] AS [Issue Instance ID] ,[i].[friority] AS [Priority] ,[p].[id] AS [Project ID] ,[pv].[id] AS [Project Version ID] ,[i].[fileName] AS [Filename] ,[i].[lineNumber] AS [Line #] ,[i].[kingdom] AS [Kingdom] ,[i].[category] AS [Category] ,FORMAT([i].[impact], 'N1') AS [Impact] ,FORMAT(ROUND([i].[likelihood], 1), 'N1') AS [Likelihood] ,ISNULL([avv].[lookupValue], 'Not Set') AS [Analysis] ,DATEADD(SECOND, [i].[foundDate] / 1000, '1970-01-01') AS [FoundDate] ,FORMAT(ROUND([i].[severity], 1), 'N1') AS [Severity] ,FORMAT(ROUND([i].[confidence], 1), 'N1') AS [Confidence] ,[i].[ruleGuid] AS [descGUID] ,[i].[engineType] AS [Engine Type] ,[i].[analyzer] AS [Analyzer] ,[i].[hidden] AS [Hidden] ,[i].[suppressed] AS [Suppressed] ,[i].[scanStatus] AS [Status] FROM [ssc].[dbo].[issue] AS [i] INNER JOIN [ssc].[dbo].[projectversion] AS [pv] ON [i].[projectVersion_id] = [pv].[id] LEFT JOIN [ssc].[dbo].[auditvalueview] AS [avv] ON [i].[id] = [avv].[issue_id] AND [avv].[attrGuid] = '87f2364f-dcd4-49e6-861d-f8d3f351686b' INNER JOIN [ssc].[dbo].[project] AS [p] ON [pv].[project_id] = [p].[id] WHERE [i].[engineType] = 'SCA' AND [p].[id] NOT IN (15, 41, 46) AND [pv].[active] = 'Y' AND [i].[hidden] = 'N' AND [i].[suppressed] = 'N' AND [i].[scanStatus] <> 'REMOVED'
